channel.title: PkIsle Development and Server CLOSED FOR GOOD!
channel.description: PkIsle Players, The Server is officially dead. Bezza recently got a new job which keeps him busy so he has no time to run it or develop it. Please DO NOT PM Me anymore and don't complain. All you people who bought PkIsle Items for RuneScape/Real Money you need to take it up with Bezza, not me. Thats All.

item.title: PkIsle Development and Server CLOSED FOR GOOD!
item.dc:creator: @fishypoo101 fishypoo101
item.description:
@fishypoo101 wrote:

no offense taken. just these couple of things. i LOVED that server. it does NOT deserve to go down. i want it up so i said i would be available to hsot it.

Read full topic
item.source: PkIsle Development and Server CLOSED FOR GOOD!

item.title: PkIsle Development and Server CLOSED FOR GOOD!
item.dc:creator: @Play_N_Skillz Play N Skillz
item.description:
@Play_N_Skillz wrote:

fishypoo101:

i could host it on hamachi for you, i don’t want this server to go dead! it was really good! i havent gotten my no-ip to work yet, but it hink i have! this DOES NOT deserve to go down.

No offense fishypoo, but I think it should go to someone 100% reliable and experienced. Someone who didn’t even get their no-ip address working is not really what I had in mind.

Read full topic

item.title: PkIsle Development and Server CLOSED FOR GOOD!

item.description:
@boomer216 wrote:

PkIsle Players, The Server is officially dead. Bezza recently got a new job which keeps him busy so he has no time to run it or develop it. Please DO NOT PM Me anymore and don’t complain.
All you people who bought PkIsle Items for RuneScape/Real Money you need to take it up with Bezza, not me.
Thats All.
